meanings: decrease, diminish, lessen, drop, fall (off), go[come] down, shrink; (서서히) dwindle (away); (단축되다) be shortened[abbreviated]

vlive.korean: 다 줄어! It goes away! 듣기 View video Apink : 야식먹방!!!
이게 더 안 줄어? - 저희가 당겨서 쓰면 돼요. Does this not get smaller? - We can zoom in! 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 더 보이즈, <아이돌룸> 기습 LIVE PICK돌!
vlive.english: Does this not get smaller? - We can zoom in!

vlive.korean: 줄어? 주위에 사람이 줄어서 문제야? Is that about you have fewer and fewer people around you? 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 신혼 때는 서로 눈만 맞아도 불이 붙는다던데... (with.버드와이저) <김준현의짠> 10회
vlive.english: Is that about you have fewer and fewer people around you?

vlive.korean: [바로 효과가 나타나는] 그냥 바로 몇 인치가 줄어요 팔다리가. your arms and legs shrink by a few inches. 듣기 View video 뷰티로그(beautylog) : [뷰티로그 2회]장재인의 싱글하우스 최초공개!?
vlive.english: your arms and legs shrink by a few inches.

vlive.korean: 왜 자꾸 줄어요? Why is it getting smaller? 듣기 View video DAY6 : DAY6의 Free한 라디오 with Young K, 도운

examples.korean: Whole stretches of land were laid waste and depopulated. 발음듣기 광활한 땅 전체가 이용되지 않은 채 내버려지고 주민의 수는 줄어 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Whole stretches of land were laid waste and depopulated. 발음

examples.korean: The strike had seriously reduced coal deliveries to industry. 발음듣기 그 파업 때문에 산업계에 석탄 납품이 현저하게 줄어 들었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The strike had seriously reduced coal deliveries to industry. 발음

examples.korean: Her work hours have been cut. 발음듣기 여자의 일 시간이 줄어 들었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her work hours have been cut. 발음

examples.korean: (The) Niagara Falls is receding. 발음듣기 나이아가라 폭포는 수량이 줄어가고 있다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
The monsoon has reduced the volume of vegetables being shipped out, resulting in a sudden increase in the prices. 발음듣기 장마로 채소의 출하량이 줄어 가격이 급등했다 Neungyule
examples.english: The monsoon has reduced the volume of vegetables being shipped out, resulting in a sudden increase in the prices. 발음
